tool_description: Calculates key financial ratios from financial statement data to assess liquidity, profitability, leverage, and operational efficiency.
error_messages: Invalid customer_id: Customer identifier cannot be empty.
Invalid financial values: current_assets, current_liabilities, total_assets, total_liabilities, total_equity, and revenue must be non-negative numbers.
Invalid net_income: Net income can be negative but must be a valid number.
Balance sheet equation error: total_assets should equal total_liabilities plus total_equity.
Division by zero: Cannot calculate ratios when denominator values are zero.
Invalid optional values: cost_of_goods_sold, inventory, and accounts_receivable must be non-negative when provided.
usage: Provide customer_id and all required financial statement values. Optionally include cost_of_goods_sold, inventory, and accounts_receivable for additional ratio calculations. The tool returns comprehensive financial ratio analysis.

customer_id.description: Customer identifier for the ratio analysis

current_ratio.description: Current assets divided by current liabilities

debt_to_equity_ratio.description: Total liabilities divided by total equity

return_on_assets.description: Net income divided by total assets

return_on_equity.description: Net income divided by total equity

calculation_date.description: Date when ratios were calculated in date-time format
